hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.local

Class LocalizationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.local.AbstractLocalizationProvider
      • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.local.LocalizationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocalizationProvider

    public class LocalizationProvider
extends AbstractLocalizationProvider
    Implementation of ILocalizationProvider that extends AbstractLocalizationProvider. Method getString(String) reads from a file with translations for current language.
    This class is a singleton, so instances can be obtained by calling a static method getInstance().
    Author:
    Dan
    See Also:
    ResourceBundle

      Returns a locale-sensitive String based on current localization setting and given key.
      void setLanguage(java.lang.String language)
      Changes the localization of this ILocalizationProvider based on given language and notifies all registered ILocalizationListener objects.
